Spoiler: The Nazis lost the war.

item.dc:creator: ohwilleke

item.title: Comment on *Blitz* (no spoilers) by M
item.description:
Reply to with many big mouse:

Only because they attacked Russia.

If they'd kept a relentless focus on Britain, and had invented V2s and especially jet aircraft like they actually did in reality (except far too late in the war to make a difference), then all of Winston Churchill's heroic oratory would have been for naught.

If things didn't happen the way they did, things would've happened differently.
